amendment.description: To provide $1,829,000,000 for the Army National Guard for the construction of 370 miles of triple-layered fencing, and 500 miles of vehicle barriers along the southwest border.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4788 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4788 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 4775. (consideration: CR S8567-8569, S8574; text: CR S8567) To provide $1,829,000,000 for the Army National Guard for the construction of 370 miles of triple-layered fencing, and 500 miles of vehicle barriers along the southwest border.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4788 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4788 proposed by Senator Kyl to Amendment SA 4775.
